title: How could one be considered for a #teampixel opportunity?
content:
I've been seeing several photographer friends of mine having the opportunity to join the #teampixel community so wanted to check if there is a way for me to express my interest in this initiative and hopefully be considered for it as well. 

I've been practicing photography professionally for 10+ years and have shot for relevant brands such as Light, Huawei, and Xiaomi in the past. I would love for a chance to be considered for a partnership with Google's Team Pixel as well.

Instagram: @canahtam
